urbansim.models.agent_location_choice_model AgentLocationChoiceModel
AgentLocationChoiceModel parcel opus_core.samplers.weighted_sampler opus_core.linear_utilities opus_core.mnl_probabilities opus_core.random_choices_from_index numpy.logical_and(SC_plan_type_id_smaller_7000, numpy.logical_and(parcel.is_street==0, SC_is_unbuilt))
